subject: Career
title: Title Negotiation: Long-Term Value
description: A fast breakdown of Title Negotiation: Long-Term Value for builders.

hook.text: 'Analyst' vs. 'Senior Analyst.' Same job, same pay ‚Äî but the title shapes your next salary forever.

buildup.text: Titles are free for companies to give but compound in value for your career trajectory.

discovery.text: Future employers use your current title as a starting point for their offer.

twist.text: An inflated title at a small company can backfire if the next employer expects matching experience.

climax.text: Negotiate for a title that accurately reflects your impact while positioning your next move.

punchline.text: A title costs the company nothing. It costs you everything if it's wrong.

quiz.question: Why is title negotiation valuable long-term?
options: Future employers use your title as a starting point for offers
